messages.message: Right, that opening is particularly aggressive. I'm guessing that they're mostly doing it to try and keep you out of Belgium, but in any case it signals that they don't want to be your friend either. I'm guessing you'll move back to London?

messages.message:
I only ask because your *best* shot by far, if you asked me, is if you get me to betray France, but at the same time you take a supply center from me so that you keep all your pieces, and at the same time throw a wrench in my betrayal so that France and I will be on roughly equal footing while at each other's throats; Bonus points if you're also relaying the plans of betrayal to the French so that they can be countered.

After all, if I win outright you've only delayed the inevitable haven't you? Better to make it messy.
messages.input:
My response to ENGLAND:'I only ask because your *best* shot by far, if you asked me, is if you get me to betray France, but at the same time you take a supply center from me so that you keep all your pieces, and at the same time throw a wrench in my betrayal so that France and I will be on roughly equal footing while at each other's throats; Bonus points if you're also relaying the plans of betrayal to the French so that they can be countered.

After all, if I win outright you've only delayed the inevitable haven't you? Better to make it messy.'.
